item.title: Host HTML slides on GitHub pages
item.description: Host your HTML slides on GitHub pages The goal of this tutorial is to demonstrate how to make HTML slidedecks that can be put on the web. Instructions for how to turn Markdown (.md), R Markdown (.Rmd), and Jupyter Notebook (.ipynb) files into slides are detailed below. One major advantage of HTML slidedecks is that you can host them on GitHub for free and share a url, instead of resorting to email or transferring files using USB drives.
